hero.title: Hi! I am Joel Taylor
hero.description: a young and passionate front-end developer crafting innovative and precise web solutions. Join me on a journey of continuous learning, and let's create something extraordinary together.

about.title: About Me
about.description: From building my first computer at 13 to thriving in the First Lego League and venturing into web development, my journey is a testament to adaptability and continuous learning. Today, as a passionate web developer, I invite you to collaborate and turn your digital dreams into reality. Let's make it happen together!

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Dive into my portfolio showcasing a spectrum of impactful projects, demonstrating expertise in web development and beyond. For an in-depth look at the code, visit my GitHub.

researchProject.title: Check out my Research Project!
researchProject.description: Have a look at my research project, 'SEO Practices to Improve Rankings in SERPs', delving into advanced SEO strategies using React JS and Tailwind CSS. From overcoming obstacles to transformative results.

Juan.title: A Great Developer!
Juan.text: A great developer who helps you describe what is needed, but also understands how to solve the problem in front of me, very attentive, he met my expectations 110%, excellent treatment, he helped me with everything, for the next project I will count on him again, him and his knowledge
Juan.name: Juan Antonio

Vithanco.title: Design Alchemist
Vithanco.text: I recently had the pleasure of working with Joel, a talented young professional from Fiverr. The task at hand was CSS styling, a complex niche that Joel navigates with considerable finesse. From the onset, Joel's expertise shone through brightly. He didn't just understand the technical requirements of my project but also took the time to comprehend the aesthetic vision that underpinned my request. Joel's skillset in CSS styling is undoubtedly vast, but it was his commitment to realizing my project that truly set him apart.
Vithanco.name: Vithanco

Walter.title: Professional and efficient
Walter.text: Joel is a true professional when it comes to web development. He was able to create a beautiful and functional website for me in a very efficient manner. His attention to detail and communication throughout the process was exceptional.
Walter.name: Walter King

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Don't hesitate to reach out! Whether you share a passion for development or your business seeks collaboration, I'm excited to connect. Your engagement plays a crucial role in shaping our journey together.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject

hero.title: Check out my blog!
hero.description: Welcome to my portfolio blog! Let's explore cool projects and the latest in tech and SEO. Jump into the mix of creativity and the ever-changing world of SEO and tech, finding new ideas in every post.

hero.title: About Me
hero.description: I'm Joel Taylor, a 17-year-old from Catalonia, Spain, studying a Baccalaureate with a passion for Computer Science. Fluent in Spanish, Catalan, and English, I'm driven by curiosity and immersed in coding.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.description: Proficient in HTML/CSS, Python, SEO, and skilled with Tailwind CSS, React JS, JavaScript, and Java. My journey, from building my first computer to mastering diverse languages, reflects a commitment to continuous learning and adaptability.

fll.title: First Lego League
fll.description: The First Lego League has been a rewarding journey, fostering STEM learning and teamwork. As a three-time finalist in the top 50 teams in Spain, the experience goes beyond competition—it's about hands-on exploration and personal growth. Joining this community has been a valuable part of my journey, and I invite others to explore its possibilities.

firstComputer.name: First Computer Build
firstComputer.description: At the age of 13, I eagerly took on the challenge of assembling my first computer after spending an entire year learning from online resources. This hands-on experience not only marked a significant milestone in my journey but also fueled a deep-seated curiosity.

fllTenerife.name: First Lego League (Tenerife)
fllTenerife.description: In my first year competing in the First Lego League, the 'Epic Lego Bulls' team from my school clinched a spot in the finals, a major feat in a competition hosting the top 50 teams in Spain. This breakthrough planted a seed of confidence, inspiring us for future victories. As a result, we headed to Tenerife, where we presented our project and battled it out on the tables with our robot—a pivotal moment that set the stage for continued success in competitive robotics.

covid.name: COVID-19
covid.description: As the COVID-19 pandemic ushered in online classes and confinement, I found a silver lining in more time on computers. This period became crucial for my development as a programmer, offering an opportunity to delve deeper into learning and explore new skills.

startPython.name: Start of Programming Journey (Python)
startPython.description: Amidst confinement, I embarked on my Python development journey, dedicating hours to tutorials and documentation. Discovering pygame—an open-source library for game development—proved to be a game-changer, amplifying my learning with its limitless possibilities.

fllTenerifeOnline.name: First Lego League (Tenerife Online)
fllTenerifeOnline.description: For the second time, our team secured a spot in the finals in Tenerife, but with COVID restrictions, the event shifted to an online format. Undeterred, we faced the challenge, participating remotely alongside 50 of the best teams in Spain. Taking on a new role as the lead programmer for the robot, utilizing Lego Mindstorms.

fllTorremolinos.name: First Lego League (Torremolinos)
fllTorremolinos.description: In the concluding chapter of my four-year journey in the First Lego League, this final season held immense emotional value. Determined to secure qualification, as the lead programmer I adopted an innovative strategy, shifting from Lego Mindstorms to Python programming. Despite the complexity, the move provided us with a competitive edge. The announcement of our qualification marked a triumphant moment, earning us a spot in the finals in Torremolinos, Málaga, and closing the FLL chapter on a high note.

startWebDev.name: Web Development Era
startWebDev.description: To expand my programming repertoire beyond Python, I ventured into web development. Starting with HTML and CSS, I quickly progressed to React JS and later added Tailwind CSS to my toolkit. This strategic approach, reminiscent of my Python learning journey, marked the beginning of my foray into the dynamic world of web development.

startFiverr.name: Initiation Into Fiverr
startFiverr.description: Recognizing the potential to monetize my skills, I ventured into freelancing on Fiverr. Observing a trend where university students were grappling with exercises involving the pygame module, I saw an opportunity. Leveraging my expertise, I decided to offer my services on Fiverr to assist students with their homework and major projects.

description.p1: From building my first computer at 13 to thriving as a freelancer on Fiverr, my journey embodies a commitment to innovation and continuous learning.
description.p2: Let's collaborate, innovate, and bring your digital aspirations to life. Today is not just another day; it's an opportunity to create something extraordinary. Let's make it happen together.
